discourse_list.title: An offline transaction and message signer for the EthereumStack

content.content: Signatory is finally released! It’s an offline transaction and message signer for the EthereumStack. It can be used for any EVM-based network, interactive API docs, deployed as a stand-alone server, sign offline, and can be implemented in nodejs projects.   twitter.com    ETC Core (etc_core)  Say hello to https://t.co/zQt511KtUS, An offline transaction and message signer for the #EthereumStack.  Getting started > https://t.co/iaxJLTyy83 API docs > https://t.co/vg0S0zaUj5  1:49 PM - 5 Feb 2020     34          18
